str2: A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To make bitter, embitter; pass: I grow angry or harsh. From pikros; to embitter.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
